dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to trespass in these desolate plains, insignificant mortal. What brings you to face the mighty Ignar, the Lava Worm?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here seeking power to conquer this land. Join me, and together we can crush our enemies.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Power-hungry, are you? I care not for alliances. Your demands fall upon deaf ears.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You underestimate the strength of unity. Together, we can lay waste to all who oppose us.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Unity? You speak of foolishness. I stand alone, and so shall you fall alone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see there is no reasoning with you. Prepare yourself, Ignar. It's time to battle.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it, foolish mortal. Let our strength be tested in combat.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I acknowledge your strength, Ignar. I shall take my leave and seek power elsewhere.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave, if you must. Tread carefully, for crossing paths with me again will lead to your demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Fine, if you wish to stand alone, so be it. But remember, the darkness within us all is a unifying force.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Darkness or light, it matters not to me. Your words hold no sway. Leave this place.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your arrogance blinds you, Ignar. I shall prove the power of unity by defeating you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Arrogance? Ha! Try as you might, you will meet your end at my fiery jaws.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, I shall leave you to your solitude. May our paths never cross again.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Indeed, may they not. Begone, before my patience wears thin.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense fear behind your pride, Ignar. Let us put our differences aside and stand together against our true foes.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fear? Ridiculous. I have no need for weak allies. Leave before I decide to end you myself.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your threats do not intimidate me, Ignar. I shall prove the strength of unity by defeating you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Defiance till the end, I see. Let our clash decide the outcome.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I shall depart, leaving you to your loneliness. May you find solace in your solitude.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Solitude is preferred to your company. Leave, and do not return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking knowledge and understanding of this land and its inhabitants. Will you share your wisdom with me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom and knowledge? Such things are wasted on the likes of you. Begone before I incinerate you where you stand.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your flames may sear my flesh, but they cannot burn my thirst for understanding. Teach me, Ignar.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubborn fool. I shall teach you the folly of your curiosity with fire and fury.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I welcome your trial by fire, Ignar. Knowledge gained through adversity is the most potent.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ignorant mortal, you shall learn the true meaning of suffering under the flames of the Lava Worm.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see your wisdom is as tempered as your flames. I shall seek knowledge elsewhere.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Seek it elsewhere indeed, for here you will find naught but destruction.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps my quest for knowledge does not align with your fiery nature. I shall take my leave, seeking enlightenment elsewhere.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Seek it elsewhere indeed, for here you will find naught but ash and cinder.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My curiosity may have led me astray. I shall depart from your realm, Ignar, with respect for your flames.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect or not, your departure is wise. Do not return, lest you wish to be consumed by fire.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking harmony with the creatures of this land, even one as formidable as yourself, Ignar.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Harmony? Your words are as empty as the air around you. Leave before my patience runs out.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let us forge a bond of understanding, Ignar. Together, we can bring balance to this desolate realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Balance is fleeting, and so shall our interaction be. Depart before I decide to end it myself.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer only goodwill, Ignar. May our paths cross again in a more hospitable time.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Goodwill means nothing to me. Your departure is the only outcome I seek.
